title: Drawing, "Floor Plan and Elevation", 1932
medium:
Graphite, red crayon, double ruled border in red cra
Support: tracing paper
markings: Stamps: Architect's stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57th STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower center: ROOM #658; at lower right is an inventory of furniture in the floor plan; furniture descriptions and designnumbers throughout
dimensions:
63.3 x 103.1 cm (24 15/16 x 40 9/16 in.)
loss at upper right
Mat:  73.7 x 106.7 cm (29 x 42 in.)
description:
The central floor plan of a living room surrounded by the elevations of four walls and the furniture against each wall. 
Scale: PLAN - 1/4"=1'-0", ELEVATIONS - 3/8"=1'-0"

exhibitions.title: Packaging the New: Design and the American Consumer, l925-l975
